title: 104_hr1024
content: The text amends various sections of different titles by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with other committees or entities such as the "Committee on Rules and Administration of the House of Representatives" and the "Public Printer". The text amends sections of various titles by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer" in different acts and codes. The text amends various sections of title 44, United States Code, by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer" and updating procedures for appeals and approvals. The text amends sections of title 44, United States Code, by replacing references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer" and updating procedures for appeals and approvals. Section 510 to 513 of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer" for various procedures and approvals. Section 513 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to replace references to the "Joint Committee on Printing" with the "Public Printer" for quality standards. Section 514 is also amended to give the Public Printer authority to apply provisions of title 31. Section 515 is amended to remove reporting requirements to the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 515 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to remove reporting requirements to the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 517 is also amended to authorize the Public Printer instead of the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 702 is amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer". Section 703 is amended to replace "Joint Committee on Printing" with either the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration or the House Committee on House Oversight. Section 707 is amended to remove authorization power from the Joint Committee on Printing. Section 707 of title 44, United States Code, is amended to allow the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives, to print bills or resolutions in the interest of economy and efficiency until final enactment in both Houses of Congress. Section 709, 714, 717, and 718 of title 44, United States Code, are amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, who will now establish rules in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 718 of title 44, United States Code is amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 721(a) is also amended to reflect this change, along with sections 722 and 723. Section 724, 728, and 738 of title 44, United States Code are amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 738, 901, 902, 903, and 905 of title 44, United States Code are amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, in consultation with relevant officials from the Senate and House of Representatives. Section 905 of title 44, United States Code is amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. Section 906 of title 44, United States Code is also amended to update the recipients of copies from the Joint Committee to the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate and the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives. Section 905 of title 44, United States Code is amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives. The recipients of copies from the Joint Committee are updated to the Committee on Rules and Administration of the Senate and the Committee on House Oversight of the House of Representatives. Section 1108, 1112, 1121, 1301, and 1320A of title 44, United States Code are amended to replace references to the Joint Committee on Printing with the Public Printer. Section 1333 of title 44, United States Code, is amended in subsection (b) by replacing "Joint Committee on Printing" with "Public Printer, in consultation with the Secretary of the Senate and the appropriate official of the House of Representatives." Section 1338 of title 44, United States Code, is also amended to remove references to the Joint Committee on Printing and replace them with the Public Printer. Section 1705, 1710, 1914, and 5(b) of title 44, United States Code are amended to remove references to the Joint Committee on Printing and replace them with the Public Printer. The Act and its amendments will take effect on the first day of the 9th month after enactment.
